input.sentences: the store front was in view .
then we rode the ferris wheel .
our last stop was the mock castle for photos .
output.sentences: The view from the front window of the store was irresistable!
They stopped to savor the aroma of roasted nuts at a vendor out front.
A wide variety of baked goods were available everywhere.
There was even a bit of extra time, so they stopped and rode the ferris wheel.
There was nothing to mock during a stop to take photos.
